title: Mission Over Mars
overview: Based on true events, Mission Over Mars presents an inspiring narrative of India's incredible mission to Mars. The story revolves around four women scientists--Nandita Hariprasad, Moushumi Ghosh, Neetu Sinha and Meghan Reddy--who played a pivotal role in its success. Experience as they battle against extreme time pressure, insurmountable technical challenges, and poor peer support with their relentless efforts to complete a mission that left the rest and the best of the world, in awe of their work.
